name: TexStar Energy Corp
tag_list: texstar, texstar-energy, texstar-energy-corp, texstar-energy-corporation, texstar-energy-luling-texas, texstar-lulling-texas, texstar-energy-corporation-lulling-texas, texstar-energy-oil, texstar-oil, charles-burris, charles-burris-lulling-texas, texas-oi
overview:
TexStar Energy is a Texas based oil and natural gas exploration company. TexStar and its experienced management team is well situated to take advantage of the many opportunities that are present in today’s energy markets.

The worldwide demand for oil and natural gas remains extremely high, and they are some of the world’s most valuable natural resources. Oil or its by-products touch almost every facet of our lives. From gasoline to kerosene, asphalt to plastics, there is no denying the importance of oil. Similarly, natural gas is a precious commodity that is only growing in usage worldwide. Stakeholders have been profiting from these resources for over a century, and they remain a major component in every savvy investor’s portfolio.

The state of Texas has a long and illustrious history in the oil and natural gas industry, beginning with the first major ‘gusher’ field discovery at Spindletop in Beaumont, Texas to the discoveries of the major oilfields along the Gulf Coast and East Texas, among others. Texas has known petroleum deposits of about 5 billion barrels, which makes up approximately one-fourth of the known U.S. reserves. Opportunities for new development and for advanced recovery on existing wells are prevalent throughout the state.

Charles Burris, President of TexStar Energy, has over 25 years of experience in the oil and natural gas industry; in addition, he has experience as the former General Manager of the Arlington Division of Timber Tech, a subsidiary of a NYSE listed company. Mr. Burris and his family have a long history in the Caldwell and Guadalupe County area, and he has used his business and personal connections in the area to locate and develop a substantial number of oil and gas properties. Mr. Burris, along with TexStar Energy and its personnel, operated in excess of 2,500 wells for Cal Tex Energy Company for over 10 years.

TexStar’s expertise and experience puts it in a unique position to take advantage of the enormous opportunities that are present in today’s market.
